title: To all those new to this forum
content:
Please, if you see something that you think is a new Keen game (like 2000 or Krodacia), search the forums for your answers before posting. Chances are that we already know about it, and it only adds clutter.

Not to attack anyone personally. I was worse than this, anyways.-----------------------------------
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=izxrocVNVOk]Dnde Esta Jeff? [/url]
Take a look at these hands! The hands speaks. The hand of a government man.

content: To be fair, ezBoard's search function sucks.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Re: To all those new to this forum
content:
I haven't tested this outside of Firefox, but you can create a new bookmark, and paste this into its URL field:

javascript:Qr=document.getSelection();if(!Qr){void(Qr=prompt('Search the PCKF for:',''))};if(Qr)location.href='http://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Ap072.ezboard.com+'+escape(Qr)+'+%22Commander+Keen+Forum%22'

Then when you click on the bookmark a window will pop up asking you for some search terms, and when you click OK it will bring up the results in Google.[url=http://www.shikadi.net/keenwiki/]KeenWiki[/url] | [url=http://www.shikadi.net/moddingwiki/]ModdingWiki[/url]

title: Re: To all those new to this forum
content:
What? phpbb is way limited, if we decide to switch at least switch to a more secure and capable forum system. Like SMF.

If you switch to a different forum system, what's the point in embedding that anyway? All newer ones come with search functions that work.____________
Don't see me as an ordinary man.
Even though I am an ordinary man.

Ah, [url=http://DaVince.sitesled.com/]site.[/url]
Oh, and [url=http://www.tengusoft.net/]Team[/url].
Or get a PCKF PHP based site, and it comes with forum software. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-wink.gif[/img]

title: Re: .
content:
